attributes.action: Pay off outstanding student loans of all NHS doctors & nurses recently recruited
attributes.additional_details: To recognise the commitment of these young people without whose work the NHS would now be in a very precarious position. It would also demonstrate your commitment to the future survival of our NHS. The debate on the feasibility of exempting payment of student loans should encompass all professions associated with the NHS.
attributes.background: Include action in an  emergency Finance Bill that is dealing with these special payments in relation to Covid-19. Also to consider the feasibility of exempting all NHS students from future student loan debts.

rejection.details:
